member.name: M:eWorkFlow.eFlowDoc.DocInfoSystem.SaveWFInstenceInfo(Platform.eWorkFlow.Model.Enm_ActionType,Platform.eWorkFlow.Model.SubmitResult,System.Boolean,Platform.eWorkFlow.Model.WorkflowStartParameter)
member.summary: "Change WFInstance 在動作執行時調用的方法用來修改流程實例信息"
member.param: 當前動作需要提交的信息

member.name: M:eWorkFlow.eFlowDoc.DocInfoSystem.DeleteWFInstance(System.String)
member.summary: 刪除流程實例(當List界面執行刪除動作時，如果調用該方法同時會刪除流程實例信息)

member.name: M:eWorkFlow.eFlowDoc.DocInfoSystem.GetOwnerWFInstance(System.String)
member.summary: 獲取是我處理的案件流程實例

permission.example: Dim mUnFinishInfos As List(Of MatchColorsApplication) = MatchColorsApplication.GetMatchColorsUnFinish() If mUnFinishInfos IsNot Nothing AndAlso mUnFinishInfos.Count > 0 Then Dim OwnerInstance As List(Of WorkFlowInstanceInfo) = DocInfoSystem.GetOwnerWFInstance(TemplateName) If OwnerInstance IsNot Nothing AndAlso OwnerInstance.Count > 0 Then For i As Integer = mUnFinishInfos.Count - 1 To 0 Step -1 Dim m As MatchColorsApplication = mUnFinishInfos(i) If Not OwnerInstance.Exists(Function(p) p.InstanceID.ToString = m.DocUniqueID) Then mUnFinishInfos.RemoveAt(i) End If Next mcs = mUnFinishInfos Else mcs = Nothing End If End If

member.name: P:eWorkFlow.eFlowDoc.IDocInfo.IsUseFlow
member.summary: 定義是否使用流程簽核(默認為True)

member.summary: 判定動作是否繼續執行
